Package com.terturl.MMO.MMOEntity.ArmorStand

Class MMOMobArmorStand

java.lang.Object
com.terturl.MMO.MMOEntity.ArmorStand.MMOMobArmorStand
public class MMOMobArmorStand extends Object
The base class of an ArmorStand that will be spawned into the world and the newly created BBOCube/Cube will be placed as the helmet slot to be used for representing a mob in game
Since:
0.59.0
Author:
Sean Rahman

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MMOMobArmorStand​(org.bukkit.Location loc, ArmorStandPart asp)
    Creates a new ArmorStand at the location with the given ArmorStandPart information to be used for representing models

    Sets where the MMOMob is looking at.

    Sets the Items CustomModelData to the provided integer to display the correct model from saddle.json created in the generate Resource Pack

    Sets the ArmorStand's location to the given location and send a packet that the ArmorStand teleported to all players on the server

  • Constructor Details

    • MMOMobArmorStand

      public MMOMobArmorStand​(org.bukkit.Location loc, ArmorStandPart asp)
      Creates a new ArmorStand at the location with the given ArmorStandPart information to be used for representing models
      Parameters:
      loc - Location to spawn ArmorStand
      asp - Part to acquire information about placement and model

  • Method Details

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition​(org.bukkit.Location loc)
      Sets the ArmorStand's location to the given location and send a packet that the ArmorStand teleported to all players on the server
      Parameters:
      loc - Location to send ArmorStand

    • setRotation

      public void setRotation​(org.bukkit.util.EulerAngle rot)
      Sets the ArmorStands head rotation for movement of the MMOMob model. This will use the origin as the rotation point but it is not coded as the Minecrafts ResourcePack does this for us
      Parameters:
      rot - Rotation to set the head

    • setMeta

      public void setMeta​(Integer i)
      Sets the Items CustomModelData to the provided integer to display the correct model from saddle.json created in the generate Resource Pack
      Parameters:
      i - CustomItemModel integer

    • spawn

      public void spawn​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Spawn ArmorStand for the following player with all metadata and equipment needed to show the model
      Parameters:
      p - Player to see ArmorStand

    • rotateHead

      public void rotateHead​(Float yaw, Float pitch)
      Sets where the MMOMob is looking at. This should only be used on the Head BBOBone, all else should use the above rotation method. Currently, pitch does not work
      Parameters:
      yaw - Yaw to set the head
      pitch - Pitch to set the head

    • despawn

      public void despawn​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Destroy the ArmorStand and send the packet to the player so they will stop seeing the ArmorStand
      Parameters:
      p - Player to stop seeing ArmorStand

    • spawnToWorld

      public void spawnToWorld​(org.bukkit.World w)
